entry.dcterms:title: The normative frameworks of the economy 2009
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-H16: The normative frameworks of the economy 2009. data sheet. Version: 2009-12-03
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: The aim of 'The economic increase social/ cultural conditions' survey is collect information about the economic culture among the population. The survey is part of the Omnibus 2009/03 research. The World Value Survey 2009 is part of this Omnibus too.
entry.dcterms:subject: economic conditions and indicators
economic systems and development
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size.
face-to-face interview
D
